name: Lucid Dream (itch) (Hissal, QBest, SLRNT)
description:
In this game, you are in your dream looking for clues, that you might be in a lucid dream. Once you've completed the "tutorial". You race against time to get all the clues in the shortest time possible.

Features

  • NPC's with dialogues
  • Health and other boosts
  • Abilities
  • Island generation algorithm
  • Story
  • Stylistic textures
  • Easter eggs
  • Once you've completed the "story mode",  you can play the "infinite mode".

This was our first Game Jam we've participated.
